iopair.name: C-C120A-SUBV-09-ST03-DT05-DF06-CF01-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64. (char [64])

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="I've reached a point where I feel the need to express my disappointment with Gov. Common W Enumeration. There are a number of reasons Gov. Enumeration isn't telling us as to why he wants to obfuscate the issue so that one can't see what ought to be completely obvious to all. In this letter, I will expose those reasons one-by-one, on the principle that his argument that the sky is falling is hopelessly flawed and thoroughly circuitous. His cold, analytical approach to philistinism doesn't take into account the human element. In particular, those who have been hurt by philistinism know that Gov. Enumeration's jobations emblematize an increasing deturpation of cultural standards and a triumph of the meretricious. Get that straight, please. Any other thinking is blame-shoving or responsibility-dodging. Furthermore, Gov. Enumeration wants to eavesdrop on all types of private conversations. Why he wants that, I don't know, but that's what he wants." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_a6XEvn8OGggjs7KAVwKO AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_a0p4wwkpwr OR segfault_code_ju6OjwRoJU OR segfault_code_xsAOz6wWlv OR segfault_code_9Cg2yE4kcf OR segfault_code_OFnNrkUzMY OR segfault_msg_fH3tvUKlpG OR illegal_inst_msg_oQE3rWnxmS) AND NOT timeout_b0mdNX1ndF) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_a0p4wwkpwr OR segfault_code_ju6OjwRoJU OR segfault_code_xsAOz6wWlv OR segfault_code_9Cg2yE4kcf OR segfault_code_OFnNrkUzMY OR segfault_msg_fH3tvUKlpG OR illegal_inst_msg_oQE3rWnxmS) OR timeout_b0mdNX1ndF OR controlled_exit_T6VB2dHH4K)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_a0p4wwkpwr OR segfault_code_ju6OjwRoJU OR segfault_code_xsAOz6wWlv OR segfault_code_9Cg2yE4kcf OR segfault_code_OFnNrkUzMY OR segfault_msg_fH3tvUKlpG OR illegal_inst_msg_oQE3rWnxmS) AND NOT timeout_b0mdNX1ndF) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_a0p4wwkpwr OR segfault_code_ju6OjwRoJU OR segfault_code_xsAOz6wWlv OR segfault_code_9Cg2yE4kcf OR segfault_code_OFnNrkUzMY OR segfault_msg_fH3tvUKlpG OR illegal_inst_msg_oQE3rWnxmS) OR timeout_b0mdNX1ndF OR controlled_exit_T6VB2dHH4K))
